title: The Shift Key
description: What happens when a stubborn techie and a surly tiger cross paths? As the first human to work for Ironside Security's cyber division, Raina knows she has a precedent to set. With a shiny new degree and the knowledge that she is the best at what she does, it should be easy so long as she follows the rules.One assignment is all it takes to ruin her carefully made plans.Soren had thought the hardest part about becoming the Warden of the Northern region would be keeping his temper in check. Then when people start mysteriously disappearing, his responsibilities put the one person he thought he'd never see again directly in his path.One mistake could send her back into his memories.
author: Deani Spice
